desc: O2TODAY masks reduce exposure to air pollution and airborne irritants including PM 2.5, weather inversion, wildfire haze, dust, and airborne pathogens like cold and flu droplets. As proud members of 1% For The Planet, our masks help you breathe cleaner, healthier air in style while also protecting the planet!

layout.text: Not all masks are created equal
Breathe safer with O2TODAY high-efficiency filtration masks.
